function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased non-HVAC loads in residential buildings","Impact":"Higher energy consumption and potential overcrowding in residential spaces","Mitigation":"Implement energy-efficient appliances and lighting, promote sustainable energy practices, and reduce overcrowding through occupancy limits","Technologies":"Energy-efficient appliances, LED lighting, smart home energy management systems","People":"Residents, building occupants","Owner":"Building owners, property managers"},{"Description":"Fluctuation in energy consumption among different income groups","Impact":"Unequal impact of pandemic-related changes on different income groups, leading to disparities in energy usage and living conditions","Mitigation":"Provide support and resources to lower-income groups, promote energy efficiency programs for all income levels, and address disparities in living conditions","Technologies":"Energy assistance programs, energy-efficient appliances, financial assistance programs","People":"Low-income households, individuals with limited resources","Owner":"Government agencies, community organizations"},{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases in residential buildings","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to overcrowding and close proximity in residential spaces","Mitigation":"Implement social distancing measures, improve ventilation systems, and promote hygienic practices","Technologies":"HVAC systems with enhanced filtration, air purifiers, touchless fixtures","People":"Residents, building occupants","Owner":"Building owners, property managers"}]}
